conversation_history.message: Hello! I'm here to help you with your complaint today. To get started, could you please tell me your name and briefly describe the issue you're experiencing?
my name is chahi, and my issue is that my Macbook is not working
I understand your frustration. Could you please provide your phone number or email address so we can contact you about the resolution?
my phone number is 45654e456 and email is abcd@123.com
Can you tell me more details about what exactly happened with your product or service?
it suddenly stopped working, the screen went black and won't turn on anymore. Very frustrating since I need it for work
What is the name or model of the product you're having issues with?
it is a MacBook Pro 13-inch model
When did you purchase this product or when did this issue start occurring?
I bought it last week on September 20th and the issue started yesterday morning
Is there anything else you'd like to add about this issue that might help us resolve it better?
I want either a replacement or full refund since this is clearly defective
Thank you for providing that information. I've recorded all the details about your complaint and we'll work on resolving this for you as soon as possible.

extracted_data.problem_description: Macbook suddenly stopped working, screen went black and won't turn on
